column5: Country Creek Bed and Breakfast offers the best for rest and it nestled on twenty acres of beautiful land. Enjoy the restful peace of being out in the country. You have space to explore nature, take a walk, watch the birds, relax and rest.  If staying for work, traveling, visiting family, couples retreat, or that well earned time to rest, you will find it offers the perfect place to relax. This country place is only a short distance from major cities, attractions, restaurants, and conveniences.
